betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Using Exorcism Soap to remove Normal Twist is a pain in the ass, and Exorcism Soap and Cleansing Water are very expensive, making it a pain in the ass for you to make them in bulk. 

This is where the Radiance of Cleansing comes in handy, the Radiance of Cleansing can steadily remove Normal Distortions, but the corresponding cost is that you need to charge it up and wait for a period of time, during which time your body will keep generating spell waves. 

At the end of the charge, 1~2 points of Normal Distortion will be deducted from you, which is relatively speaking a worthwhile thing to do in the later stages. \To create this item, you will need to unlock the hidden research "Radiance of Cleansing" located in "Arcane Magic", which is preceded by "Pearl of the Beginning".
betterquesting:10.name:8: More efficient removal of distortions - Clean Glow
